text: Alessandro Pessot (born 1 July 1995, in Udine) is an Italian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2017 : 1st Overall Carpathian Couriers Race ::1st Stage 1 : 4th Törökbálint GP - Memorial Imre Riczu : 6th Trofeo Città di San Vendemiano : 8th Ruota d'Oro ;2018 : 2nd GP Kranj : 9th GP Adria Mobil ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Udine
title: Alessandro Pessot
